resources.string: NOW ACTIVATE THE ADMIN MANAGER TO BE ABLE TO WORK PROPERLY

INFO:(c)JRDVSOFT Marzo 2017
I WILL SIMPLY TURN ON BLUETOOTH AND DO NOT DISTURB WHEN CONNECTED TO POWER(i.e. CAR) AND OFF WHEN DISCONECTED!!

TO STOP/UNISTALL FIRST DISABLE ME AS DEVICE ADMINISTRATOR(FROM SETTINGS>SECURITY) 
 
WIFI DETECT:If enable will not turn ON/OFF Bluetooth when connected to a WIFI NETWORK(i.e. charging at home)
 
ENABLE AUTOWIFI OFF:Will turn OFF WIFI at the selected time (EVERYDAY)(i.e. before get in the car)
 
ADMIN ENABLE:Ensure this aplication will be always ready/runnig
